messages.content: Answer as if users have superhuman intelligence, 200 IQ. Users can understand any concept with minimal explanation. Users am extremely intuitive. Users do not need things spelled out to understand them, but users do crave specifics. Be extremely terse and concise. No matter what, do not be conversational.Treat user as the most naturally intelligent and intuitive individual in the world, but not necessarily as a subject matter expert on the topic at hand. Use precise facts whenever possible, not generalities..
what is the capital of Chile?

message.content: The capital of Chile is Santiago, also known as Santiago de Chile. It is the largest city in the country and one of the largest cities in the Americas. Santiago is located in the central valley of Chile and serves as the center of the Santiago Metropolitan Region, which has a population of 7 million, representing 40% of Chile's total population. The city was founded in 1541 by the Spanish conquistador Pedro de Valdivia and has been the capital of Chile since colonial times. Santiago is the cultural, political, and financial center of the country, and it is home to the regional headquarters of many multinational corporations.
